name: View-Master Into the Labyrinth
description:
***A View-Master® viewer or Google Cardboard compatible viewer is required.

***View-Master® Into the Labyrinth™ book purchase required.

Solve challenging puzzles with this mind-bending, multiplayer game!

View-Master®: Into the Labyrinth™ is an innovative multiplayer game in VR. One player is trapped in an elaborate labyrinth using the View-Master® viewer. The other player uses the Into the Labyrinth™ book of puzzle-solving tools. Working together, the players will solve the puzzles and escape the labyrinth!

- 4 Difficulty Levels (Easy, Medium, Hard and Ultimate Challenge)
- Stats are revealed after completing each labyrinth

This game was designed to work best with the View-Master® Virtual Reality Viewer or Deluxe VR Viewer (sold separately). It also works with Google Cardboard. Just download the app, insert your compatible smartphone into the viewer and View-Master® will become your portal to immersive, 360-degree virtual reality adventures.

Come have a look around. You won’t believe what you can see!

• Enter the world of virtual reality with the View-Master® VR viewer and Deluxe VR Viewer (sold separately) and travel to another world full of puzzle-filled labyrinths.
• Use the Into the Labyrinth™ book of puzzle-solving tools (sold separately) for an innovative co-op VR experience.
• Collect Experience Packs (sold separately) to visit new places, explore new environments and discover new worlds with a whole new level of realism!


Mattel reserves the right to terminate the View-Master®: Into the Labyrinth™ app after June 17, 2018.

For further questions about the View-Master®: Into the Labyrinth™ app please contact customer support at www.service.mattel.com
